description:
GRAVE BEFORE SHAVE Pine Beard Tee

name: 1 oz. dropper bottle of GRAVE BEFORE SHAVE Pine Scent Beard Oil
description:
1 oz. dropper bottle of GRAVE BEFORE SHAVE Pine Scent Beard Oil

Contains all natural ingredients that condition, moisturize, and strengthen those precious beard hairs promoting healthy growth!!

This product is also designed to treat the skin under your beard preventing dandruff and flaking to keep your beard life comfortable...the way it should be!

Beard oil with a pleasant pine scent for the lumber jack in all of us!

name: SLICK DEVIL POMADE 4OZ.
description:
For the Men: Comb it, spike it, slick it back! 
For the Ladies: Create smooth, polished updo styles and tame those fly aways! 
A little goes a long way! 
Water soluble, doesn't flake, easy to rinse out, easy to re-comb, matte finish, medium to firm hold hair styling pomade with a clean, light and fresh scent for both men and women. 
Directions: Emulsify in hands, apply, then style. For that slick look apply when hair is slightly damp. 

Made in the USA 
Tested on friends and family NOT on animals. 
For external use only
